name: Bunny Plague
description:
You love your garden and especially your giant award winning carrot.
Nearby rabbits found out about your carrot and they are hungry, and so are you.

Keep your carrot alive by throwing your self grown turnips at those bunnies,
while eating a turnip or two to keep yourself alive as well.

Controls:
Keyboard
- WASD/Arrow Keys - Move/Jump
-SPACE - Jump
- L/C - Pickup/Throw
- K/X - Pickup/Eat

Xbox Controller
- D-PAD - Move
- A - Jump
- B - Pickup/Throw
- X - Pickup/Eat

The Analog Sticks are not supported

Made in 48 hours with my own engine tako,

for Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive

Thanks for playing!
